TestDescription.name: Apache version older than 1.3.28

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in this version of Apache. You should upgrade to the latest version of Apache. [break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 1.3.27).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Multiple. Check references for details about every vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache to the latest version.
